name: ARE YOU STILL WORKING SO LATE?
name_original: ARE YOU STILL WORKING SO LATE?
description:
A short interactive thriller by Jonothan Rubock

Mac and Linux versions are untested let me know how you do.

Marco is a hitman, recently done with his last boyfriend, and about to be done with his last assignment. You discover him in a dark hotel room and hear his story.

Some things in this project are not mine and are credited here:

Font - Steeltongs
Campari Label - Best-Guide.ru
Bombay Label - Amazon.co.uk
Paris Skyline - Miriadna.com (converted to skybox by me)
Louis Pattern - bang-a-rang.deviantart.com
